5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn ‘Abbas that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“There are three whose prayer do not rise more than a hand span above their heads: A man who leads people (in prayer) when they do not like him; a woman who has spent the night with her husband angry with her; and two brothers who have severed contact with one another.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَمَّ قَوْمًا وَهُمْ لَهُ كَارِهُونَ
chapter.eng-name: The one who leads people in Prayer when they do not like him (to lead them)
